item.title: insider: unwrapping reality/opening
item.description:
We have adapted Insider into installations for opening events to reach audiences outside the performance schedules. Each installation explores various elements of the work while adapting to the theme of the hosting event.

These installations were created by a collective of artists - Cristina Maldonado, Keya Singh, Eva Rosemarijn, Lea KukoviÄiÄ, Isa Juchniewicz, Lamija ÄŒehajiÄ‡. Our individual participation at each event changes as needed.

Premiere at CED with TerÃ©n

28/11/19, Brno, CZ
